message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $105.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell the product to you for $108.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with a price of $107.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'm willing to make another small concession and sell the product to you for $109.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with a price of $108.
